import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./Register.css"; class WorkerRegister extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { name: "", phone: "", password: "", password2: "", errors: {}, }; } onChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.id]: e.target.value }); }; onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const newUser = { name: this.state.name, phone: this.state.phone, password: this.state.password, password2: this.state.password2, }; console.log(newUser); }; render() { const { errors } = this.state; return (
